whatIs.title: Your AI That Actually Does Things
whatIs.subtitle: OpenClaw is an open-source AI assistant that runs locally on your device and connects to your favorite apps.

local.title: Runs Locally
local.desc: Your data stays on your device. Full control, full privacy.

connected.desc: Telegram, Discord, WhatsApp, Slack, iMessage ‚Äî one assistant, all platforms.

memory.title: Persistent Memory
memory.desc: Remembers your preferences, past conversations, and adapts over time.

extensible.title: 700+ Skills
extensible.desc: From calendar management to web scraping ‚Äî extend capabilities with community skills.
